Unlike other apps, Ello never uses your private data to target ads. You are seeing this message only because someone chose this public one-to-many channel as a space to promote their messages. This means that no user data is mined or analyzed to display ads, and every user viewing a channel on Ello sees the same sponsored message.

Unlike other apps, Ello doesn\'t track whether you tapped on a sponsored message and doesn\'t profile you based on your activity. We also prevent external links in sponsored messages to ensure that third parties can’t spy on our users. We believe that everyone has the right to privacy, and technological platforms should respect that.

Ello offers free and unlimited service to hundreds of millions of users, which involves significant server and traffic costs. In order to remain independent and stay true to its values, Ello developed a paid tool to promote messages with user privacy in mind. We welcome responsible advertisers at:
Ads should no longer be synonymous with abuse of user privacy. Let us redefine how a tech company should operate – together.

Channels offer a simple way to reach a wide audience without the complexities of traditional website management.
The Subscription Channel is a way for content creators to monetize their expertise and build a sustainable income stream through subscription-based access to their content and community

Private channels offer a balance between broad reach and controlled access, making them suitable for organizations, businesses, or individuals who want to share content with a specific audience while maintaining some level of privacy and control over the distribution of their content.

If the channel has a permanent public link, other users will be able to find it and subscribe to it.\n\nYou can use Latin letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and underscores. The minimum length is 5 characters.

If the Masterclass has a permanent public link, other users will be able to find it and subscribe to it.\n\nYou can use Latin letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and underscores. The minimum length is 5 characters.

A Private Channel is a messaging feature that allows users to broadcast messages to a large audience in a more controlled manner. Key features: 
 1. Limited Access: Unlike Public Channels, Private Channels are not openly accessible. Users need a specific invite link or must be added by the channel administrator to join. 
 2. One-Way Communication: Typically, only channel administrators can post content. Regular members can view but not respond directly in the channel, unless activated. 
 3. Subscriber Privacy: Members' identities are usually hidden from other subscribers, providing a level of anonymity. 
 4. Unlimited Subscribers: Like public channels, private channels can have an unlimited number of members. 
 5. Content Sharing: Administrators can share various types of content including text, images, videos, files, and links. 
 6. Forwarding Restrictions: Channel creators can restrict the ability to forward content from the channel, adding an extra layer of privacy. 
 7. Searchability: Private channels do not appear in public search results, making them more exclusive. 
 8. Selective Sharing: Ideal for sharing content with a specific group of people, like employees, club members, or a select audience. 
 9. Customizable Settings: Admins can adjust various settings like join requests, and comment sections.

A Public Channel is a massaging feature where you can share content without cost or technical expertise. Key features: 
 1. Easy creation: No need for development skills or expenses. 
 2. Unique names: Each channel has a distinct @channel_name and https://ello.team/channel_name. 
 3. Discoverable: Anyone can search for and subscribe to public channels. 
 4. Versatile content: Share various types of media and information. 
 5. Unlimited audience: No cap on subscriber numbers. 
 6. Team management: Option to have multiple administrators. 
 7. Dual updates: New content appears in both feed and chat areas.

A Subscription Channel is a messaging feature for building recurring revenue by serving and engaging a community on an ongoing basis. Key features: 
 1. It's ideal for those aiming to build recurring revenue through community engagement. 
 2. It's not limited to any specific type of business - anyone with niche expertise and a passion for sharing it can create a Subscription Channel. 
 3. Subscribers pay a monthly fee to access new and exclusive content. 
 4. It allows creators to receive financial support from their audience. 
 5. It's described as the "perfect digital product" for selling to an audience interested in ongoing, community-based content.

Creating Masterclass lets you turn something you already have — your expertise — into a new source of revenue. If you have the expertise, and a passion for sharing it with the world, then an Masterclass is the perfect digital product for you to sell.

People are eager to learn, whether they want to learn a new hobby, or advance themselves professionally — you can serve them by launching an Masterclass.

In the matter of seconds, you will have all of the tools you could ever need to create an Masterclass to teach people just about anything — from tai chi and cooking online to yoga, playing a guitar and more.

You can type a prompt and AI chat will generate a response. This can include creative writing, informative content, conversation continuations, answers, and more.
You can input an incomplete sentence, and AI chat will suggest possible ways to complete it.
AI chat can translate text from one language to another, allowing you to communicate with others despite language barriers.
You can input a lengthy piece of text, and AI chat will provide a concise summary of the main points or key ideas.
You can ask questions, and AI chat will provide relevant answers.
AI chat can rephrase sentences or paragraphs while retaining the original meaning.
You can receive AI chat suggestions for improving the clarity, grammar, and style of the written content.
For programming-related tasks, you can seek AI chat assistance with code snippets, debugging, and problem-solving.
Users can engage in interactive text-based conversations with AI chat as though they\'re having a chat with a knowledgeable entity.
AI chat can generate ideas for blog posts, stories, marketing campaigns, and more, based on the user\'s input.
Users can request AI chat to create poetry, stories, dialogues, and other forms of creative writing.
Users can ask AI chat to provide facts, definitions, explanations, or descriptions of various topics.
AI chat can simulate the writing style of different authors, allowing users to generate content in a specific voice or tone.
Users can input data or statistics, and the AI chat can help interpret and explain the insights derived from the data.
Users can describe concepts, scenarios, or hypothetical situations, and AI chat can provide detailed descriptions or extrapolations.
The AI chat has access to the internet where it can search for real-time data, news, and updates, and provide users with up-to-date and relevant data.

This AI function allows users to generate images based on textual descriptions or prompts. Users can input detailed descriptions of what they envision, and the AI-powered system will interpret these descriptions to generate corresponding images.

This AI function is designed to restore old or damaged photographs by removing scratches, blemishes, and imperfections. Users can upload photos that have scratches or other visual flaws, and the AI system will intelligently analyze the image to digitally repair and improve it.
This AI function adds colors to black and white or grayscale photos, transforming them into vibrant and lifelike color images.

Sometimes, images may have a low resolution, resulting in pixelation and loss of detail when they are enlarged. The AI function for increasing photo resolution utilizes advanced upscaling algorithms to enhance the clarity and sharpness of images, making them suitable for larger prints or digital displays without compromising quality.

When old or damaged photos have faces that are deteriorated or blurred, this AI function steps in to restore the quality of the faces within the images. By employing facial recognition and restoration algorithms, the AI system identifies facial features and applies enhancements to recreate the original appearance of the faces.

Account deletion information

We understand that you\'re looking to delete your Ello Messenger account, and we\'re here to guide you through the necessary steps. Before proceeding, please ensure that you have withdrawn your leftover balance, canceled any active subscriptions, transferred ownership or deleted subscription channels that you created, as these actions may affect your account closure process. Additionally, it\'s important to note that any products or services purchased within the app will be lost when you delete your account. Here\'s how you can do it:

1. Withdraw Your Leftover Balance:

  •  Navigate to your Ello Pay.
  •  Locate the option to withdraw Main wallet or Business wallet.
  •  Follow the on-screen instructions to initiate the withdrawal process.
  •  Make sure your balance is fully withdrawn before proceeding to the next step.

2. Cancel Your Active Subscriptions:

  •  Look for the "Subscriptions" section.
  •  Identify and cancel any active subscriptions associated with your account.
  •  Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation.
  •  Ensure all subscriptions are successfully cancelled.

3. Cancel Subscriptions Made with Apple or Google:

  •  If you have subscribed to Ello Messenger through Apple (iOS) or Google (Android), please note that these subscriptions are managed directly through your respective app stores.
  •  To cancel an iOS subscription:
  •  On your iOS device, go to Settings.
  •  Scroll down and tap "iTunes & App Store."
  •  Tap your Apple ID at the top of the screen.
  •  Tap "View Apple ID" and sign in if prompted.
  •  Tap "Subscriptions."
  •  Find the Ello Messenger subscription and cancel it.
  •  To cancel an Android subscription:
  •  Open the Google Play Store.
  •  Tap the menu icon (three horizontal lines) in the upper-left corner.
  •  Tap "Subscriptions."
  •  Find the Ello Messenger subscription and cancel it.
  •  Once canceled, your subscription through Apple or Google will no longer renew.

    4. Transfer Ownership or Delete Subscription Channels:

    •  If you\'ve created subscription channels (subscription or Course), consider transferring ownership to another/admin user or deleting them.
    •  To transfer ownership:
    •  Go to the channel\'s settings.
    •  Find the option to transfer ownership.
    •  Select the new owner and confirm the transfer.
    •  To delete a channel:
    •  Navigate to the channel\'s settings.
    •  Locate the option to delete the channel.
    •  Follow the steps to permanently remove it.

    After you have completed these steps, your account should be free of any active subscriptions, subscription channels, and leftover balance. Once everything is in order, you can proceed with the account deletion process.

    Please be aware that when you delete your Ello Messenger account, any products or services purchased within the app will be lost, and you won\'t be able to recover them. Make sure to consider this before proceeding with the deletion.

    It\'s essential to take these steps carefully and thoughtfully to ensure a smooth transition. If you encounter any issues or have further questions, don\'t hesitate to contact our customer support for assistance.

    We hope this guide helps you delete your Ello Messenger account smoothly. If you ever decide to return, you\'re always welcome back.

    Best regards, Ello Team.
